name: TV Tagger
short_description:
There are many utilities around to add metadata to movie files for use in media library software like iTunes.  Some of these access the TVDB to get information about TV episodes.  

However, I have yet to find one that really streamlines the process, so that necessary user interaction is minimal.

The goal of this project is to give users a simple utility with a single purpose: tagging a set of video files with the relevant TV episode info.
summary: A simple utility to automatically tag TV episode video files.
